branchCategory.name: CKZT
branchCategory.description: <p>Power clamp cylinder series CKZT, was designed with a rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion to reduce weld spatter accumulation.&nbsp; The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.&nbsp; Series CKZT is available with G or NPT threads and bore sizes equivalent to 25, 40, 50, 63 and 80mm.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder, w/o Arm, 25 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, 25mm bore.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, 25 Bore
CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder w/o Arm, 40~80 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, series CKZT, was designed with a rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion to reduce weld spatter accumulation.  The arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.  Series CKZT is available with G or NPT threads and bore sizes equivalent to 25, 40, 50, 63 and 80mm.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, 40~80 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>Clamp arm for SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, series CKZT 40mm, 50mm, 63mm, and 80mm bores.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder, w/Manual Hand Lever (NOT SUPPORTED IN THE US)
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, series CKZT with manual hand lever, was designed with a rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion to reduce weld spatter accumulation. <strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">This product is NOT supported in the US.</span></strong></p>

branchItem.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder, w/Manual Hand Lever, 50 & 63 Bore
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, series CKZT with manual hand lever, was designed with a rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion to reduce weld spatter accumulation.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT*, Power Clamp Cylinder, X2797/ X2798
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's small power clamp cylinder, series CKZT25-X2797 and X2798, was designed for handling or clamping small workpieces.  The arm opening angle of 90 and 105 degrees are available.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZT25 Power Clamp Arm for X2797
branchItem.description: <p>Clamp arm for SMC's compact type power clamp cylinder, series CKZT 25mm</p>
